students.question: When does the career fair start?
students.answer: SPACE will open its doors to students starting at 10 am. Please remember to sign up for the career fair ahead of time here!

students.question: How do I attend?
students.answer: You can sign up for SPACE at [link]. We’ll send out more information as soon as we can confirm your attendance.

students.question: What is the dress code?
students.answer: There isn’t a strict dress code for the event. Keep it simple!

students.question: What kind of companies will be coming?
students.answer: Our lineup of companies will be coming soon! Attending companies will be posted in October.

students.question: Will there be free swag?
students.answer: We’ll be giving out free SPACE t-shirts! (while supplies last though :>)

students.question: Should I bring my resume?
students.answer: Feel free to! Though make sure to upload your resume on the ACM at UCSD student portal as well. We’ll be sharing them with companies after the event.

companies.question: When and Where is SPACE?
companies.answer: SPACE will be held from 10 am to 4 pm on November 15th, 2022. Please arrive around 9 am to facilitate set-up and check-in. The career fair itself will be hosted in the Price Center West Ballroom. Parking assistance and information will be provided closer to the event (October)

companies.question: How do I sign up?
companies.answer: You can register for SPACE at our eventbrite page here : Event Page

companies.question: What is the deadline to join?
companies.answer: The deadline to sign up for SPACE will be October 31st, 2022

companies.question: What kinds of students are going to SPACE?
companies.answer: SPACE is open to all UCSD students. However, we do expect most attendees to be those interested in computing or design related careers.
